settings.name: James Peterson, RN
settings.content: Working as a home health nurse, I've encountered many DME providers, but none compare to Home Medix. Their team's knowledge and dedication to finding the right equipment for each patient are remarkable. They truly prioritize customer service, making them a pleasure to work with.
